user.title: Auckland Rubbish Collection setup
user.description: Get your Assessment Number from the [Auckland Council Find Your Collection Day]({url}) search page. See the Help for more information if needed.

data_description.address_name: A name to identify this address (e.g. Home)
data_description.address_id: The 11-digit Assessment Number from the collection day page (e.g. 12345678901)

error.invalid_id_length: Assessment Number must be exactly 11 digits long
error.invalid_id_format: Assessment Number must contain only digits (0-9)
